structure.unit: ARTICLE XIII. TRAFFIC AND TRANSPORTATION DEPARTMENT

law.catch_line: Existing control devices declared effective until changed.

text.section:
Sec. 2-98. Existing control devices declared effective until changed.
All traffic control devices installed, existing, operated or in force and effect on September 16, 1960, shall remain in full force and effect and shall be observed, complied with and obeyed, until modified, changed or removed by the Traffic and Transportation Department.
